title: Letter to Jane: An Investigation About a Still
brief_description: The film’s subject is a photograph of Jane Fonda visiting Hanoi during the Vietnam War. It asks what the position of the intellectual should be in the class struggle and points out the irony of Jane Fonda’s participation in the photo shoot, which was staged.

constellations_other.name: Film-truth
constellations_other.description: The experimental documentary Man with a Movie Camera has had a lasting impact on the development of film styles.
